name: 李鎮宇
objective:
As a 3rd year course in marketing research, this course is designed to

1.　　Introduce the role, scope, process and fundamental concepts of marketing research
2.　　Provide an understanding of research methodology and its implementation (using R)
3.　　Support the student to do a real marketing research project
schedule:
Week　　Date　　Topic
1　　Course Overview
2　　Introduction to Marketing & Marketing Research 
3　　Defining the Marketing Research Problem; Developing an Approach; Research Design 
4　　Causal Research Design
5　　Exploratory Research, Descriptive Research Design
6　　Measurement & Scaling
7　　Questionnaire Design 
8　　Sampling & Sample Size Determination
9　　Exam Week
10　　Statistics Review 
11　　Analysis of Variance and Covariance
12　　Correlation and Regression
13　　Course Project Presentation and Feedback
14　　Discriminant and Logit Analysis
15　　Factor Analysis
16　　Cluster Analysis
17　　Course Revision
18　　Exam Week
scorePolicy:
20% Participation, homework, quizzes
20% Assignment 1: Business Case Report
20% Assignment 2: EMBA project - Project Proposal
20% Presentation 1: EMBA project - Project Presentation
20% Individual final report
100% Total
materials: Naresh K. Malhotra, Marketing Research: An Applied Orientation, Pearson Education, 2020.
